程序包 yang.weiwei.tlda

类 TLDAParam

  • java.lang.Object
    • yang.weiwei.tlda.TLDAParam
  • public class TLDAParam
extends java.lang.Object

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      修饰符和类型 字段 说明
      double alpha
      Parameter of document-topic distribution's Dirichlet prior (default: 0.01)
      double beta
      Parameter of each tree node's child distribution's Dirichlet prior (default: 0.01)
      int numLeafNodes
      Total number of leaf nodes
      int numTopics
      Number of topics (default: 10)
      int numVocab
      Vocabulary size
      TLDATopicPriorNode topicPrior
      Prior tree structure (w/o weights)
      boolean updateAlpha
      Update alpha (default: false)
      int updateAlphaInterval
      Interval of updating alpha (default: 10)
      boolean verbose
      Print log on console (default: true)
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> vocabList
      Vocabulary list
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> vocabMap
      Word to number map
      java.util.ArrayList<java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>>> vocabPaths
      The paths to words
